Tags.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   Tags.h
00006 
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   This class holds a few informational tags, such as Title, Author,
00010   etc. that can be associated with a project or other audio file.
00011   It is modeled after the ID3 format for MP3 files, and it can
00012   both import ID3 tags from MP3 files, and export them as well.
00013 
00014   It can present the user with a dialog for editing this information.
00015 
00016   It only keeps track of the fields that are standard in ID3v1
00017   (title, author, artist, track num, year, genre, and comments),
00018   but it can export both ID3v1 or the newer ID3v2 format.  The primary
00019   reason you would want to export ID3v2 tags instead of ID3v1,
00020   since we're not supporting any v2 fields, is that ID3v2 tags are
00021   inserted at the BEGINNING of an mp3 file, which is far more
00022   useful for streaming.
00023   
00024   Use of this functionality requires that libid3tag be compiled in
00025   with Audacity.
00026   
00027 **********************************************************************/
00028
